    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public long getID()
        Get the ID from this device.
        Returns:
        the device ID. If the ID is not valid it will return Utils#INVALID_DEVICE_ID

      • start

        public void start(SitumBuilding building,
                  SitumPositioningOptions options)
        Start the positioning service for a given building.

        If the building does not have a valid positioning service it show a message and service does not initialize. We can pass to this method a SitumPositioningOptions with custom values for the positioning service, for example when to use wifi, ble or mag.

        Now we can pass to the options that we can simulate positions. With this option we can develop without wifi or ble.

        If building is null then throw an IllegalArgumentException, and the positioning is not started, equal for options
        Parameters:
        building - Building where we want to estimate our position
        options - Options for the positioning system
        See Also:
        SitumPositioningOptions

      • start

        public void start(SitumBuilding building)
        Start the positioning service for a given building. This for default create a SitumPositioningOptions with all sensors enabled

        If the building does not have a valid positioning service it show a message and service does not initialize.

        If building is null then throw an IllegalArgumentException and the positioning is not possible
        Parameters:
        building - building to start positioning

      • start

        @Deprecated
public void start(SitumBuilding building,
                              boolean usewifi,
                              boolean useble,
                              boolean usemag)
        Deprecated. 
        Start the positioning service for a given building.

        If the building does not have a valid positioning service it show a message and service does not initialize

        Parameters:
        building - Building where we want to estimate our position
        usewifi - Use wifi to estimate the position
        useble - Use beacons to estimate the position
        usemag - Use magnetic field anomalies to estimate the position

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the positioning service IMPORTANT NOTICE: this method should be called when application closes or is moved to background to avoid unnecesary battery and data usage

        Change building while running
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the change was correctly made, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        route - the route
